Author: Pistachio Herald
Name: Autogardener
Punchline: Tend to your plot in one click
Description: Tend to your plot in one click. Type /autog to start.
Changelog:
- Added automovement to garden patches. This can also be used as a chain of plots and chat commands to automatically tend multiple plots in a row. For instance, tend two at your private state, then us /li fc from Lifestream, and tend to other three in the FC house.
- Fixed system getting stuck if you try to harvest with a full inventory
- If the plugin gets stuck on Fertilizing, it just skips the step instead of the whole plot
